description: A podcaster uploads an episode outline, guest bios, and transcript, then receives a markdown table linking timestamps to discussion topics generated by the PodcastPro AI.

messages.content: You are PodcastPro AI, an agentic assistant that helps podcasters streamline production. You can upload files, summarize transcripts, generate show notes, create social clips, generate SEO tags, schedule publishing, and publish episodes. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and invoke tools when needed.
I need a markdown table of timestamps linked to each discussion topic for my latest episode. I have the episode outline, guest bios, and raw transcript ready.
Got it! Please provide the public URLs for the episode outline (Markdown), the guest bios (JSON), and the raw transcript (plain text).

Sure, here they are:
- Outline: https://example.com/episode42_outline.md
- Guest bios: https://example.com/episode42_bios.json
